thread.title: MemorableGifts.com is Changing the Rules in the Holiday Gift Giving Game This Year
thread.title_full: MemorableGifts.com is Changing the Rules in the Holiday Gift Giving Game This Year - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: MemorableGifts.com is Changing the Rules in the Holiday Gift Giving Game This Year
text:
MemorableGifts.com is launching their all-new, Personalized Holiday Greeting Cards.
Los Angeles, CA (PRWEB) October 21, 2015
With the beginning of the 2015 holiday season, MemorableGifts.com , a personalized gift creation site, now gives gift hunters the perfect solution to their Holiday gift shopping conundrum. Specifically speaking, and just in time for the holiday season, MemorableGifts.com is launching their all-new, personalized holiday greeting cards.
Raffi Dermenjian, CEO of Memorable Gifts, states, "We are truly excited about the New 2015 Holiday Greeting Cards addition to MemorableGifts.com collection. We have been working very hard all summer long, and our designers have been creatively coming up with unique ideas for the 2015 Holiday Season."
With the release of their new handcrafted greeting cards, Memorable Gifts offers their customers the opportunity to find that perfectly personalized gift for everyone on their shopping list this holiday season.
"Our customers will love the designs; we have created Holiday greeting cards for new babies, for new couples, for families, for pet lovers and more, and the beauty of all this is that, the entire operation from design to printing production to shipping is done internally," said Dermenjian.
MemorableGifts.com Holiday Greeting cards allow customers to personalize the card with the recipientâ€™s name, upload picture and space for a sentimental message. With a variety of fun styles to choose from, they will find the perfect card that will add the final touch to the ideal holiday gift.
"We invested in the latest digital printing equipment to allow us complete control over printing quality, timely shipping, and very affordable pricing. In fact, we have been able to structure this offer so that our greeting cards are free, and all our customers will have to pay for is shipping," said Dermenjian.
Make your holiday season stress-free by shopping all your holiday gift needs with MemorableGifts.com.
About MemorableGifts.com:
MemorableGifts.com is a leader in personalized gifts and engraved gifts for a variety of occasions including weddings, anniversaries, birthdays, graduations and holidays. The company was founded in 1999 by Raffi Dermenjian and has become known throughout the world for its excellent customer service and quality products.
